about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in Cube Conflict, a free and open-source FPS where smileys wage war without mercy. Choose your side and equip yourself with powerful weapons as you face off against enemy forces in intense and chaotic battles.

  • Choose from a wide range of weapons. From simple swords and crossbows to futuristic lasers guns, and super weapons.
  • Choose from 15 classes, each with its unique abilities and skills.
  • Chase more than 10 powerful items to use in battle, including shields, boosts, and super-weapons.
  • Explore 5 unique and immersive environments, from the moon's low-gravity landscape to the fiery depths of a volcano.
  • 3 game modes, including deathmatch, capture the flag, and domination, each with its unique rules and challenges.
  • Compete against other players online, with official servers available 24/7.
  • Earn achievements and track your player stats as you compete against others online.
  • Customize your character with a wide range of skins, including capes, graves, and smileys.
  • 100% free, all skins are unlocked while playing!

Weapons you said?

Experience the power of advanced weapons, including the portable GAU-8, atomic bombs, and rocket miniguns.

Class system

Doctor, Soldier? For newbies. No doubt you would rather be a Kamikaze to blow yourself up and kill all the enemies around you or even a wizard to cast magic spells!

Useful(?) items

Even when death seems inevitable, you can turn the tide with the protection of power armor and the strength of powerful drugs.

Maps (for real!)

Incredible there are maps on this game! So, everyone knows rocket jump? Well, try it on the moon.

A lot of skins

Choose your character's appearance to look like a badass instead of an idiot, and leave a lasting impression with unique graves, including poop for the noobs and gold ingots for the wealthiest players.

Planned content

  • More maps!
  • Advanced tools for e-sport: Better server moderation and improved spectator experience.
  • Single-player campaign with a quest system in a semi-opened world.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and use of illegal drugs.

detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in Cube Conflict, a free and open-source FPS where smileys wage war without mercy. Choose your side and equip yourself with powerful weapons as you face off against enemy forces in intense and chaotic battles.

  • Choose from a wide range of weapons. From simple swords and crossbows to futuristic lasers guns, and super weapons.
  • Choose from 15 classes, each with its unique abilities and skills.
  • Chase more than 10 powerful items to use in battle, including shields, boosts, and super-weapons.
  • Explore 5 unique and immersive environments, from the moon's low-gravity landscape to the fiery depths of a volcano.
  • 3 game modes, including deathmatch, capture the flag, and domination, each with its unique rules and challenges.
  • Compete against other players online, with official servers available 24/7.
  • Earn achievements and track your player stats as you compete against others online.
  • Customize your character with a wide range of skins, including capes, graves, and smileys.
  • 100% free, all skins are unlocked while playing!

Weapons you said?

Experience the power of advanced weapons, including the portable GAU-8, atomic bombs, and rocket miniguns.

Doctor, Soldier? For newbies. No doubt you would rather be a Kamikaze to blow yourself up and kill all the enemies around you or even a wizard to cast magic spells!

Choose your character's appearance to look like a badass instead of an idiot, and leave a lasting impression with unique graves, including poop for the noobs and gold ingots for the wealthiest players.

legal_notice:
Cube Conflict game, any release.

Copyright (C) 2013-2024 Jean Onche

This software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty. In no event will the authors be held liable for any damages arising from the use of this software.

Permission is granted to anyone to alter and redistribute this software freely, subject to the following restrictions:

1. The origin of this software must not be misrepresented; you must not claim that you wrote the original software.

2. Altered source versions must be plainly marked as such, and must not be misrepresented as being the original software.

3. Only unmodified software may be redistributed under the name "Cube Conflict" Example: If you make changes, you must indicate in the name of your project that it is a "mod" or a "fork" of Cube Conflict, or that it's another project unrelated to Cube Conflict.

4. Redistribution of Cube Conflict for profit is not permitted. This means that the sale, redistribution via links containing forced advertisements, and distribution of an installer for this game containing advertisements or third-party software are strictly prohibited.

5. This notice may not be removed or altered from any source distribution, even with major modifications.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0 / Ubuntu 16.04 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2180 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon R5 M430
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.0 with GLSL 1.20 / Libs: libGL (OpenGL), SDL2 (>= 2.0.0), SDL2_image, libopenal, libsndfile, libpng, libjpeg, zlib, glibc 2.22 or above
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0 / Ubuntu 18.04 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD drive, OpenGL 3.0 with GLSL 1.30 / Libs: libGL (OpenGL), SDL2 (>= 2.0.0), SDL2_image, libopenal, libsndfile, libpng, libjpeg, zlib, glibc 2.22 or above

short_description: Join the battle in Cube Conflict, a free and open-source FPS game where dumb smileys are locked in a never-ending war... Expect the unexpected as you face off against a ninja wielding a GAU-8 or priests wielding nuclear missiles and power armor. Download now and join the fight!
